    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Razvrščajmo</string>
            <string language="en">Let\'s classify</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Let\s stufen sich ein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Let\ classifient</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Let\ classifica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Let\ classifica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Let\ ταξινομεί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Let\ clasifica</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Naloga je namenjena motivaciji. Reševalec razvija sposobnosti razvrščanja po določenih izhodiščih</string>
            <string language="en">Simple exercise to classify animals into predefined groups according to their living environment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">žival</string>
            <string language="en">animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sesalec</string>
            <string language="en">mammal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">razvrstitev</string>
            <string language="en">classification</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfache Übung, zum der Tiere in vorbestimmte 
Gruppen entsprechend ihrer lebenden Umgebung einzustufen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercice simple pour classifier des animaux dans 
les groupes prédéfinis selon leur environnement vivant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercício simples para classificar animais em 
grupos predefinidos de acordo com seu ambiente vivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazione semplice per classificare gli 
animali nei gruppi predefiniti secondo il loro ambiente vivente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απλή άσκηση για να ταξινομήσει τα ζώα στις 
προκαθορισμένες ομάδες σύμφωνα με το περιβάλλον διαβίωσής τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejercicio simple para clasificar animales en 
grupos predefinidos según su ambiente vivo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säugetier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klassifikation</string>
          </keyword>
